Text: Thanks!!! I'll rate later when I've seen it =)

93 seeders are fakes also so block them if yoru
seeing other then 100percent on a CA ip

there however a minor crackling sound in places just noticed while watching on laptop
i think its cos the source rip was too loud and caused clipping.. I always find this with m4a audios in webstreams espc since they use bit rates of like 600kb/s

I found using VLC audio filters.. EQ set it on preset DANCE seems to rid most of it

its worse around father and son segment

If it's anything like last week there's a straight 10 from me. if people would have the indecency  to complain then fuck em.

Fakes? o.O Can you block seeders, I don't get it.
Videos fine for stream. Audio is is a bit meh but totally ok. Thanks for the up!

yes you can block any ip.. with tools like peer block or peer guardian

but i block non sharers and bad clients with
utorrents ipfilter.dat google it.. can
copy ip from peer list on utorrent with right click
and add the ips you want to block in the dat file

seeders are normally listed as 100 percent in the peer list tab

sound i would lower to 8 for this one.
the crackling seemed to come about end segment and lasted 5min or so.

no doubt a HDTV ver will come about now I spent a hour ripping and 1 hour or so uploading it LOL :)

some always moan or hate :/ i rather see it then not at all.. no guarantee a capper did it

have a heart failure
cappers i mean scene cappers.. they only release HD rips even though they might have a analog tv rip or vhs they wouldnt release it.. I release any source I can find basically
